desc: You will be working with the best of the best in developing high tech web appliccation. Well verse and experineced in Html, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Bootstrap and Animation. Graphics knowledge is a plus!
Youll be working along the sharpest and curiously creative group of individuals. Be knowledable of microsoft word, Excell abd Mac software. Knowledge of animation pipeline is a plus.
Work closely with the Build and QA teams on improvements to the test and release infrastructure. Collaborate with other teams to improve the developer experience working within the studio codebase.
Collaborate with artists and other engineers to provide innovative technical solutions that extend our artistic and engineering reach.
Serve as backup for department coordinator functions, such as meeting scheduling, agenda management for leadership meetings, and notes as the need arises
